### New features

* [#124](https://github.com/rubocop/rubocop-minitest/pull/124): Add new `Minitest/NoAssertions` cop. ([@ghiculescu][])

### Changes

* [#129](https://github.com/rubocop/rubocop-minitest/pull/129): Drop Ruby 2.4 support. ([@koic][])
